attributes.review: This app is weirdly glitchy, and I even read that it farms data from the rest of your phone, do not download it.

attributes.review: Took me 2 months to download and like 6 background checks once I was in bc I am Latina. Just got a notification that they plan to deport my grandma and now I’m living on the streets in Chicago. Also orange man bad.

attributes.review: As soon as i opened the app it let out a loud high pitch screech that killed my animals!!! I used to be trump 2020 but now after what he purposely done do my animals i will NOT be voting for that monster!

attributes.review: Politics aside, this app has a lot of technical issues. Impossible to use.
attributes.title: Way too many bugs

attributes.title: Get gross orange mans app off the store

attributes.review: takes sooo long to download and makes the rest of my phone glitchy. i’ve never seen anything like it. when it finally downloaded the app was so hard to navigate. and don’t even get me started on the misspelled words and terrible grammar presented in the app. this app was definitely not well constructed.

attributes.review: I was so disappointed in this app, it glitches and pop ups come up on my phone like my battery is low but instead it yells at me to leave this orange doodoo head a 5 star review 😔 DO NOT DOWNLOAD VERY BAD NOT GOOD VERY BAD
